returns._0: Array of size 7 with the following distribution: rewards[0]: Strategist BABL rewards[1]: Strategist Profit rewards[2]: Steward BABL rewards[3]: Steward Profit rewards[4]: LP BABL rewards[5]: total BABL rewards[6]: total Profits rewards[7]: Creator bonus

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amount: Amount of tokens to send the address to returns the amount of tokens transferred
params._to: Address to send the tokens to

params._principalWeight: New % of principal weigth for strategy rewards
params._profitWeight: New % of profit weigth for strategy rewards

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._addOrSubstract: Whether we are adding or substracting capital
params._capital: Amount of capital in any type of asset to be normalized into DAI

params._addOrSubstract: Whether we are adding or substracting capital
params._capital: Amount of capital in any type of asset to be normalized into DAI

checkMining(uint256,address).notice: Check the mining program state for a specific quarter and strategy

estimateStrategyRewards(address).notice: Get an estimation of strategy BABL rewards for active strategies in the mining program

estimateUserRewards(address,address).notice: Get an estimation of user rewards for active strategies

getBABLMiningParameters().notice: Returns the percentages of BABL Mining program

getContributorPower(address,address,uint.notice: Gets the contributor power from one timestamp to the other

getGardenProfitsSharing(address).notice: Check the garden profit sharing % if different from default

getRewards(address,address,address[]).notice: Calculates the profits and BABL that a contributor should receive from a series of finalized strategies

getStrategyRewards(address).notice: Gets the total amount of rewards for a given strategy

sendTokensToContributor(address,uint256).notice: Sends BABL tokens rewards to a contributor after a claim is requested to the protocol.

setBABLMiningParameters(uint256,uint256,.notice: Change default BABL shares % by the governance

setProfitRewards(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Set customized profit shares for a specific garden by the gardener

updateProtocolPrincipal(uint256,bool).notice: Function that adds/substract the capital received to the total principal of the protocol per timestamp

updateStrategyCheckpoint(address,uint256.notice: PRIVILEGE FUNCTION to update strategy data
